parameters.name: Line
parameters.description: The DNS resolution line. The line can be the default line, China Telecom, and China Mobile.

parameters.name: Open
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable or disable weighted round-robin. Valid values:

*   **true** (default): enables weighted round-robin.
*   **false**: disables weighted round-robin.

parameters.name: SubDomain
parameters.description: The subdomain name for which you want to enable weighted round-robin. Set the parameter to @.example.com instead of example.com.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the Domain Name System (DNS) record. Valid values: A and AAAA. Default value: A.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.
